leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 材料-DFT 生态（输入/求解/后处理）
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 结构生成→DFT→后处理→高通量→验证

unit.unit_name: 结构构建/缺陷/超胞与输入生成

queries: [WEB] dft input file generator tools github
[WEB] point defect builder materials science github

tools.name: made.js
tools.one_line_profile: JavaScript library for creating and manipulating material structures
tools.detailed_description: Materials Design in Javascript (made.js) is a library allowing for the creation and manipulation of material structures from atoms up, designed for web-based materials science applications.

tools.name: wave.js
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based Atomic Viewer and Editor for material structures
tools.detailed_description: A JavaScript library for 3D atomic visualization and editing, enabling the manipulation of material structures from atoms up on the web.

tools.name: pymatgen-io-espresso
tools.one_line_profile: Pymatgen addon for parsing Quantum ESPRESSO files
tools.detailed_description: A pymatgen extension that provides input/output parsing capabilities specifically for Quantum ESPRESSO, facilitating the integration of QE calculations into pymatgen workflows.

tools.name: PyXtal
tools.one_line_profile: Generation of atomic crystal structures with symmetry constraints
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for generating atomic structures with specific symmetry constraints, useful for crystal structure prediction and materials discovery.

tools.name: PyXtal_FF
tools.one_line_profile: Machine Learning Interatomic Potential Predictions
tools.detailed_description: A package for developing machine learning interatomic potentials, enabling atomistic simulations with ML-derived force fields.

tools.name: QuantumESPRESSOBase.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia tools for Quantum ESPRESSO input generation and structure manipulation
tools.detailed_description: Provides basic data structures and functions in Julia for manipulating crystal structures and generating input files for Quantum ESPRESSO calculations.

tools.name: nfp
tools.one_line_profile: Keras layers for materials deep learning with rdkit and pymatgen
tools.detailed_description: A library providing Keras layers and utilities for building end-to-end deep learning models for molecules and materials, integrating with RDKit and Pymatgen.

tools.name: ScalableWorkflow_VASP_Calculations
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for generating randomized VASP input structures for alloys
tools.detailed_description: A scalable workflow designed to generate VASP input cases with randomized atomic structures for solid solution binary and ternary alloys across compositional ranges.

tools.name: readcif
tools.one_line_profile: Fast C++ CIF and mmCIF parser
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance C++ library for parsing CIF (Crystallographic Information File) and mmCIF formats, essential for reading structural data.

tools.name: ShakeNBreak
tools.one_line_profile: Defect structure-searching with chemically-guided bond distortions
tools.detailed_description: A tool for generating defect structures by applying chemically-guided bond distortions to identify ground-state defect configurations in materials.

tools.name: doped
tools.one_line_profile: Generation, processing and analysis of defect supercell calculations
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for the generation, pre-/post-processing, and analysis of defect supercell calculations, streamlining the defect simulation workflow.

tools.name: surfaxe
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for slab generation and surface calculations
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for generating and handling slab structures for first-principles surface calculations, including surface energy analysis.

tools.name: AtomicStructureGenerator
tools.one_line_profile: Crystal structure generator using prototype databases
tools.detailed_description: A module that utilizes the Crystal Structure Prototype Database (CSPD) to generate lists of crystal structures for user-defined systems, facilitating high-throughput materials screening.

tools.name: CatKit
tools.one_line_profile: High-throughput catalysis modeling toolkit
tools.detailed_description: General purpose tools designed for high-throughput catalysis research, providing utilities for structure manipulation, adsorption generation, and analysis.

tools.name: VASP-DOS_extractor
tools.one_line_profile: VASP density of states extraction script
tools.detailed_description: A Pymatgen-based Python script designed to extract total and projected density of states (DOS) data directly from VASP vasprun.xml output files.

tools.name: VASP-Structural_Descriptors
tools.one_line_profile: Atomic structure descriptor collector
tools.detailed_description: A script leveraging Pymatgen to calculate and collect structural descriptors from large sets of atomic structures for materials analysis.

tools.name: VASPIN_GEN
tools.one_line_profile: VASP input file generator
tools.detailed_description: A Python script to automate the generation of standard VASP input files (INCAR, KPOINTS, POTCAR) and job submission scripts.

tools.name: mcp-atomictoolkit
tools.one_line_profile: MCP server for atomistic simulations
tools.detailed_description: A Model Context Protocol (MCP) compatible server that exposes atomistic simulation capabilities (via ASE, pymatgen) to LLM agents.

tools.name: JARVIS-Tools
tools.one_line_profile: Data-driven atomistic materials design package
tools.detailed_description: An open-source software package for data-driven atomistic materials design, providing tools for high-throughput calculations, machine learning, and database interaction (NIST-JARVIS).

tools.name: molecule-synthesis
tools.one_line_profile: Generative AI for brain-targeting molecules
tools.detailed_description: A multi-objective generative AI framework designed for the synthesis and design of novel small molecules targeting the brain.

tools.name: beautiful-atoms
tools.one_line_profile: High-quality atom/molecule rendering with Blender
tools.detailed_description: A Python module that interfaces with Blender to create high-quality, publication-ready 3D renderings of atoms and molecular structures.

tools.name: crawfish
tools.one_line_profile: Pymatgen-compatible plotting tool
tools.detailed_description: A rewrite of the ultrasoftcrawfish tool designed for compatibility with pymatgen, used for plotting and analyzing materials properties.

tools.name: icsg3d
tools.one_line_profile: 3D inorganic crystal structure generation
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework for 3D inorganic crystal structure generation and property prediction via representation learning.

tools.name: ase-notebook
tools.one_line_profile: ASE/Pymatgen structure visualization in Jupyter
tools.detailed_description: A tool for highly configurable 2D (SVG) and 3D (Three.js) visualizations of ASE and Pymatgen atomic structures directly within Jupyter Notebooks.

tools.name: StructurePrototypeAnalysisPackage
tools.one_line_profile: Atomic structure symmetry and similarity analysis
tools.detailed_description: A package to analyze symmetry and compare the similarity of a large number of atomic structures, useful for prototype classification.

tools.name: Hetero2d
tools.one_line_profile: 2D heterostructure discovery automation
tools.detailed_description: A tool to automate the discovery and property computation of stable 2D materials stacked on substrates or other 2D layers.

tools.name: cod-tools
tools.one_line_profile: Crystallography Open Database tools
tools.detailed_description: A collection of tools and parsers for handling CIF files, maintained by the Crystallography Open Database (COD) developers.

tools.name: atco
tools.one_line_profile: ATCO-CIF to JSON converter
tools.detailed_description: A Ruby-based parser and converter for transforming ATCO-CIF crystallographic data files into JSON format.

tools.name: deepmd-kit
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning molecular dynamics package
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning package for generating many-body potential energy representations and performing molecular dynamics simulations.

tools.name: dftd4
tools.one_line_profile: DFT-D4 dispersion correction tool
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the generally applicable atomic-charge dependent London dispersion correction (DFT-D4) for density functional theory calculations.

tools.name: bandstructureplots
tools.one_line_profile: Band structure visualization tool for pymatgen
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool to plot electronic band structures using pymatgen, featuring RGB scales to visualize atomic or orbital contributions.

tools.name: maptools
tools.one_line_profile: Materials simulation data processing toolkit
tools.detailed_description: An open-source program based on Pymatgen for processing materials simulation data, facilitating input setup and output analysis.

tools.name: chemeleon
tools.one_line_profile: Text-guided diffusion model for crystal structure generation
tools.detailed_description: A generative AI tool that uses text-guided diffusion models to generate crystal structures, enabling inverse design from textual descriptions.

tools.name: ASE_ANI
tools.one_line_profile: ANI neural network potential interface for ASE
tools.detailed_description: A Python interface integrating the ANI-1 neural network potential with the Atomic Simulation Environment (ASE) for molecular dynamics and atomistic simulations.

tools.name: jkitchin-vasp
tools.one_line_profile: Enhanced ASE interface for VASP
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing an ASE-compliant interface to VASP, developed by John Kitchin, offering advanced workflow automation and analysis capabilities.

tools.name: pydefect
tools.one_line_profile: Point-defect calculation tool for non-metallic solids
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for performing point-defect calculations in non-metallic solids based on first-principles calculations (VASP), handling defect formation energies and corrections.

tools.name: CrystaLLM
tools.one_line_profile: Large Language Model for crystal structure generation
tools.detailed_description: A Large Language Model trained on CIF files to generate valid crystal structures, enabling generative design of new materials.

tools.name: MPWorks
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow management system for Materials Project calculations
tools.detailed_description: A custom workflow package that merges pymatgen, custodian, and FireWorks to manage high-throughput DFT calculations for the Materials Project.

tools.name: MPmorph
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for running and analyzing ab-initio molecular dynamics (AIMD)
tools.detailed_description: A collection of tools to run and analyze ab-initio molecular dynamics (AIMD) calculations using VASP, built upon the Materials Project infrastructure.

tools.name: pymatgen
tools.one_line_profile: Robust materials analysis code for structure definition and electronic structure analysis
tools.detailed_description: A core Python library for materials analysis that defines classes for structures and molecules, supporting input/output for many electronic structure codes like VASP, Gaussian, and more.

tools.name: pymatgen-analysis-alloys
tools.one_line_profile: Pymatgen add-on for alloy system description and analysis
tools.detailed_description: An add-on package for pymatgen containing classes and tools specifically designed for describing alloy systems and analyzing relevant data.

tools.name: pymatgen-analysis-defects
tools.one_line_profile: Defect analysis modules for pymatgen
tools.detailed_description: A specialized add-on for pymatgen to handle point defect analysis, including formation energy calculations and finite-size corrections.

tools.name: pymatgen-db
tools.one_line_profile: Database management tool for Materials Project style databases
tools.detailed_description: An addon to pymatgen that enables the creation and management of MongoDB-based databases for materials data, following Materials Project schemas.

tools.name: pymatgen-io-validation
tools.one_line_profile: Input/output validator for DFT calculations
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive validator to ensure VASP calculations are compatible with Materials Project data standards, with potential for other DFT codes.

tools.name: pymatgen-analysis-diffusion
tools.one_line_profile: Pymatgen add-on for analyzing diffusion in materials
tools.detailed_description: Tools for analyzing diffusion pathways and calculating diffusion coefficients from molecular dynamics or nudged elastic band (NEB) calculations.

tools.name: supercell
tools.one_line_profile: Program to create regular structure supercells from CIF files
tools.detailed_description: A tool that allows the creation of regular structure supercells from CIF files, handling partial occupancy and substitutions.

tools.name: Atomsk
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for manipulating and converting atomic data files
tools.detailed_description: A command-line tool for converting between various atomic data file formats and performing manipulations like supercell creation, defect insertion, and dislocation generation.

tools.name: DFTtoolbox
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for building inputs and analyzing DFT results
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolbox designed to facilitate the quick generation of input files and the analysis of results for Density Functional Theory (DFT) codes.

tools.name: pyiron
tools.one_line_profile: Integrated development environment for computational materials science
tools.detailed_description: An integrated development environment (IDE) that provides a workflow framework for computational materials science, supporting various simulation codes and data management.

tools.name: atomium
tools.one_line_profile: Python macromolecular parsing and generation library
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for parsing, manipulating, and saving macromolecular structures (PDB, CIF, MMTF formats), suitable for structural biology and materials.

tools.name: pysktb
tools.one_line_profile: Slater Koster tight-binding solver
tools.detailed_description: A scientific Python package for solving Slater-Koster tight-binding topological hamiltonians, useful for electronic structure calculations.

tools.name: catkit2
tools.one_line_profile: Hardware control package for astronomical testbeds and telescopes
tools.detailed_description: A Python package developed by STScI for controlling testbed hardware, specifically designed for high-contrast imaging and optical experiments in astronomy.

tools.name: crystcif-parse
tools.one_line_profile: JavaScript parser for Crystallographic Information Files (CIF)
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight JavaScript library for parsing Crystallographic Information Files (CIF), commonly used in materials science and chemistry to describe crystal structures.

tools.name: Genarris
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular crystal structure generation and polymorph prediction workflow
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for generating molecular crystal structures and performing robust workflows for polymorph prediction, utilizing genetic algorithms and other sampling techniques.

tools.name: supercell-core
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for investigating multilayer 2D heterostructure lattices
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed for building and investigating supercells of multilayer 2D heterostructures, facilitating the study of moiré patterns and lattice mismatch.

tools.name: JARVIS-Tools
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source software package for data-driven atomistic materials design
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive toolkit from NIST for data-driven atomistic materials design, including modules for high-throughput DFT calculations, machine learning force fields, and materials data analysis.

tools.name: MAST
tools.one_line_profile: Materials Simulation Toolkit for automation of calculation workflows
tools.detailed_description: MAterials Simulation Toolkit (MAST) is designed to manage and automate computational materials science workflows, particularly working with pymatgen for structure manipulation and input generation.

tools.name: ternary-diagram
tools.one_line_profile: Library for drawing ternary diagrams for materials science
tools.detailed_description: A Python package specifically designed to draw beautiful and customizable ternary diagrams (phase diagrams) without the heavy dependencies of larger materials frameworks like pymatgen.
